Articles.Content:
So here is a pick of the new updated version of the 747 (just new engines). As i already mentioned the aircraft flyes really well for its size .

I originally didnt try to make an exact replika but more of a 747ish aircraft.

Click on the link below to see the aircraft and some others in greater detail.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136613-Some-noteworthy-passenger-planes-from-my-collection-%28747-707-AWACS-777ish-DC-9-ish-aircraft-etc%29

Download link:https://www.dropbox.com/s/0gglchf53cilmmm/koeing-747%20%28flagless%29.craft?dl=0. (aircraft supplied will be flagless)

I hope you enjoy this kspfied version of the jumbojet .

That's huge! Looks like the -8i variant.

Love it!
Thanks. And yep, that Is the 747-8 international (I actually have a flight cutaway poster of the thing). But I think my favourite is still the 747-400.
